import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a specific user view"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/views/{viewId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a specific saved user view (filter configuration) by its unique identifier. User views store saved search criteria and column configurations for the users list interface.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views) to list available views. Extract `Items[].ViewId` from the response.

**Workflow Example**
1. List user views: [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views) â†’ identify target view.
2. Call this endpoint: [GET /api/v1.0/users/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/views/get-user-view) with the view UUID.
3. Use returned filter configuration to apply saved search criteria.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/users/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/views/delete-user-by-id) - Delete this view
- [POST /api/v1.0/users/views/new](/docs/api/users/create-user-view) - Create a new view

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A single user view","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ViewId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Name":{"type":"string"},"Description":{"type":"string"},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"},"description":"UUID of the user (OwnerId). Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users), extract `Items[].UserId`."}},"title":"UserView"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
